subproject.description:
1.   Strengthened institutional capacity for effective knowledge sharing and mutual learning on poverty reduction and enhanced awareness and dialogue on pro-poor policy issues and options among policymakers, academics and practitioners for strengthened coherence between pro-poor policy research, design and implementation processes within China as well as between China and other developing/transition economies 
 2.   Comprehensive approach to income and human poverty reduction policy issues promoted through new policy-driven research work and training development covering both pro-poor macro-policies and targeted anti-poverty interventions, measuring and monitoring
subproject.title: Int'l Poverty Reduction Center

title: International Poverty Reduction Center in China
